points: To impart robust knowledge of the Civil Engineering by using latest teaching learning tools, technologies and pedagogies.
To facilitate for higher education and competitive examinations through structural trainings, expert lectures and interaction with entrepreneur.
To empower the students with necessary employability skills and social sensitivity.

To produce a creative and well performing Civil Engineering Graduates who can fulfil the requirements of market, industry, Government as well as academia and contribute in infrastructure and economic development of the society and nation.

Our Civil Engineering program emphasizes a strong foundation in technical knowledge, practical skills, and innovative problem-solving. By integrating real-world applications, cutting-edge technologies, and interdisciplinary collaboration into the curriculum, we aim to nurture graduates who are not only proficient in theory but also adaptable and responsive to the dynamic challenges of the profession. This holistic approach ensures that our students are well-prepared to lead projects that shape sustainable and resilient infrastructure.
